text: Joseph Ayo Babalola (25 April 1904 â€“ 26 July 1959) was the first General Evangelist of the Christ Apostolic Church, Nigeria. ==Death== The death of Joseph Ayo Babalola took place on 26 July 1959 at Ede, Osun State, Nigeria. Babalola seemed to have shown "no sign of illness" prior to his death. The story of his death is credited to one Baba Abiye at Ede. ==Related pages== *Christ Apostolic Church ==References== Category:1959 deaths Category:1904 births Category:Nigerian Christian clergy
title: Joseph Ayo Babalola
